name: linear
description: Linear integration tool that interfaces with Linear's GraphQL API to provide human-readable output. Features secure credential management, issue tracking, team management, project management and basic issue operations. Supports both stored credentials and per-request API keys.

api_key.description: Linear API key (optional if credentials are stored)

name.description: Name for project creation or update

title.description: Title for issue creation or update

description.description: Description for issue or project creation/update

status_id.description: State/status ID for issue updates for a given team

user_id.description: User ID to assign issues to the corresponding user for a given team

include_archived.description: Whether to include archived issues in results

output_schema.description: Human-readable formatted output of the Linear operation
